named-query.name: GetTestMessages
named-query.query: SELECT m FROM JProject m ORDER BY m.description ASC

named-query.name: GetRecordsFromAccountWithParentType
named-query.query: SELECT r FROM WalletRecord r inner join r.walletType t inner join r.walletAccount a where r.income = :income and a.id = :accountId and t.parentType is null

named-query.name: GetRecordsFromAccountWithAllTypes
named-query.query: SELECT r FROM WalletRecord r inner join r.walletType t inner join r.walletAccount a where r.income = :income and a.id = :accountId ORDER BY t.name ASC

named-query.name: GetRecordsFromAccountWithType
named-query.query: SELECT r FROM WalletRecord r inner join r.walletType t inner join r.walletAccount a where t.id = :typeId and r.income = :income and a.id = :accountId ORDER BY r.date ASC

named-query.name: GetRecordsFromAccountWithTypeFromTo
named-query.query: SELECT r FROM WalletRecord r inner join r.walletType t inner join r.walletAccount a where t.id = :typeId and r.income = :income and a.id = :accountId AND r.date BETWEEN :from AND :to ORDER BY r.date ASC

named-query.name: GetRecordByParentType
named-query.query: SELECT r FROM WalletRecord r WHERE r.walletType.id = :typeId

named-query.name: GetRecordByType
named-query.query: SELECT r FROM WalletRecord r WHERE r.walletType.id = :typeId

named-query.name: GetChildren
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM WalletType t WHERE t.parentType.id = :typeId OR t.id = :typeId

named-query.name: GetRecordByTypeIncome
named-query.query: SELECT r FROM WalletRecord r WHERE r.walletType.id = :typeId and r.income = :income

named-query.name: GetIdOrderForTypes
named-query.query: SELECT walletType.id, count(walletType.id) FROM WalletRecord r GROUP BY walletType.id order by COUNT(walletType.id) DESC

named-query.name: GetUserProjectsByUser
named-query.query: SELECT up FROM JUserProject up WHERE up.user.id = :userId

named-query.name: GetUserProjectsByProject
named-query.query: SELECT up FROM JUserProject up WHERE up.project.id = :projectId

named-query.name: GetUserApplicationsByApp
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM NexusUserApplicationRef uApp inner join uApp.user u WHERE uApp.application.id = :appId
